metadata.title: CVE-2023-43115 on Ubuntu 18.04 FIPS Compliant (bionic) - medium
metadata.description: In Artifex Ghostscript through 10.01.2, gdevijs.c in GhostPDL can lead toremote code execution via crafted PostScript documents because they canswitch to the IJS device, or change the IjsServer parameter, after SAFERhas been activated. NOTE: it is a documented risk that the IJS server canbe specified on a gs command line (the IJS device inherently must execute acommand to start the IJS server).

criterions.comment: ghostscript: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
